overview: If only fiction were fact, every man who lusts after men would be lined-up down the block to join the Baker County Police Academy, the one featured in Jet Set Men's Police Academy Gangbang. In this Chris Steele film fantasy, all the participants – from Cadets and Sergeants to one majorly hung Chief – are hot looking guys with great bodies, well-hung and horny. Nothing gets in the way of sex.
title: Police Academy Gangbang
